Address_Text: Sulaymaniyah Bakhtiari Street - above Youth Center - upper floor of City Star Bakery
Visit_Gallery_Text: Experience our stunning artwork in person. Our gallery showcases the finest collection of large-scale paintings and custom artwork.
Get_Service_Text: We pride ourselves on offering not only a diverse collection of stunning artworks but also the flexibility to bring your vision to life.
About_Title: Luxor: Where Art Comes to Life
About_Text_1: Founded in 2020, Luxor is a premier destination for art enthusiasts and collectors seeking exceptional, handcrafted paintings. Our showroom showcases a stunning collection of hundreds of unique pieces, each meticulously created by skilled artisans dedicated to the timeless craft of painting. Renowned for our Italian-quality standards, every artwork is a testament to craftsmanship, attention to detail, and artistic excellence.
About_Text_2: At Luxor, we believe that art is a personal expression. That's why we offer bespoke, customized paintings tailored to your preferences—any size, any style. Whether you're seeking a statement piece for your living space or a personalized gift, our team is committed to bringing your vision to life with the highest level of artistry and professionalism.
About_Quote: Discover the beauty of handmade art at Luxor—where every brushstroke tells a story.

footer.company_description: At Luxor, art is more than decoration—it's an expression of individuality.
